member.name: M:Global.AddError(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Add a test error to the Errors array
member.param: The message that describs the test error.

member.name: M:Global.RunFormTests(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Runs the tests of the given form
member.param: The name of the tested form

member.name: M:Global.RunGlobalTests(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Runs the tests of the tests of the global.sb file and shows the results on the given form
member.param: The name of the form that will display the results

member.name: M:Global.RunAllTests(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Runs all the tests of all forms
member.param: The textbox that will deisplay the test results.

member.name: M:Global.AssertEqual(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Checks if the test actual value is the expected value
member.param: The actual value of the test
The expected value from the test
The name of the test, to be displyed in the result.
member.returns: Returns a string message that displays the test result, saying whether it passed or failed and why.

member.name: M:Global.AssertTrue(Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallVisualBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Checks if the test actual value is true
member.param: The actual value of the test
The name of the test, to be displyed in the result.
member.returns: Returns a string message that displays the test result, saying whether it passed or failed and why.
